plot: Sky Channel's Saturday morning children's show featuring wall to wall cartoons, music and other programmes that was broadcast all over Europe. Presented by Mr. P (later replaced by Andy Sheldon), Crocker the Crocodile and Snoot the Seal.
plot_en: Sky Channel's Saturday morning children's show featuring wall to wall cartoons, music and other programmes that was broadcast all over Europe. Presented by Mr. P (later replaced by Andy Sheldon), Crocker the Crocodile and Snoot the Seal.
plot_es: Sky Channel's Saturday morning children's show featuring wall to wall cartoons, music and other programmes that was broadcast all over Europe. Presented by Mr. P (later replaced by Andy Sheldon), Crocker the Crocodile and Snoot the Seal.
title: Fun Factory
